snippet.title: Survivorman VR: The Descent - Reveal Trailer for PS VR2
snippet.description:
LAUNCHING FEB 15 2024: Survivorman VR: The Descent is a chilling virtual reality survival adventure sim based on the hit tv series "Survivorman". 

Fight for your life against the Arctic elements as you find your way back to civilization with the help of survival expert Les Stroud. Can you conquer the wilderness and get to safety before you freeze to death…or worse?

Survivorman VR: The Descent launches on PlayStation VR2 and Steam (for PC VR headsets) on February 15, 2024!
  
PS VR2: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10009240/
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2185160/Survivorman_VR_The_Descent/
Meta Quest:  https://www.meta.com/experiences/4963945450326977/

Join our Discord to stay up to date:  https://discord.com/invite/4TcqKmQs7V
Or visit us: https://survivormanvr.com/

https://www.tiktok.com/@UCiWiV2zRTv8V8oDEmvqMtqw 
https://www.reddit.com/r/SurvivormanVR/
https://www.instagram.com/survivormanvr/
https://www.facebook.com/SurvivormanVR

#survivormanvr #survival #survivorman #LesStroud #metaquest3 #metaquest2 #metaquest #vrgaming
